function getCategoryColor(index){const colors=['#3B82F6','#10B981','#F59E0B','#EF4444','#8B5CF6','#06B6D4','#84CC16','#F97316','#EC4899','#6366F1','#14B8A6','#F43F5E','#A855F7','#06B6D4','#84CC16'];return colors[index%colors.length];}function generateMonthlyData(purchaseOrders){const months=['Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','Jun','Jul','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec'];const currentYear=new Date().getFullYear();return months.map((month,index)=>{const monthOrders=purchaseOrders.filter(po=>{const poDate=new Date(po.created_at);return poDate.getFullYear()===currentYear&&poDate.getMonth()===index;});return{month,orders:monthOrders.length,value:monthOrders.reduce((sum,po)=>sum+(po.total_amount||0),0)};});}function generateTopSuppliersData(purchaseOrders,suppliers){const supplierOrderCounts=purchaseOrders.reduce((acc,po)=>{const supplierId=po.supplier_id;if(supplierId){acc[supplierId]=(acc[supplierId]||0)+1;}return acc;},{});return Object.entries(supplierOrderCounts).map(_ref3=>{let[supplierId,orders]=_ref3;const supplier=suppliers.find(s=>s.id===parseInt(supplierId));return{name:(supplier===null||supplier===void 0?void 0:supplier.name)||`Supplier ${supplierId}`,orders:orders};}).sort((a,b)=>b.orders-a.orders).slice(0,10);}function generateInventoryValueData(inventory,products){return inventory.map(item=>{const product=products.find(p=>p.id===item.product_id);return{name:(product===null||product===void 0?void 0:product.name)||`Product ${item.product_id}`,value:(item.quantity||0)*((product===null||product===void 0?void 0:product.price)||0)};}).sort((a,b)=>b.value-a.value).slice(0,10);}function generateCategoryPerformanceData(categories,products,inventory){return categories.map(category=>{const categoryProducts=products.filter(product=>product.category_id===category.id);const totalValue=categoryProducts.reduce((sum,product)=>{const inventoryItems=inventory.filter(item=>item.product_id===product.id);const stockValue=inventoryItems.reduce((itemSum,item)=>itemSum+item.quantity*product.price,0);return sum+stockValue;},0);return{category:category.name,products:categoryProducts.length,value:totalValue};});}function generateStockMovementData(inventory,products){return inventory.map(item=>{const product=products.find(p=>p.id===item.product_id);return{name:(product===null||product===void 0?void 0:product.name)||`Product ${item.product_id}`,price:(product===null||product===void 0?void 0:product.price)||0,quantity:item.quantity||0,value:(item.quantity||0)*((product===null||product===void 0?void 0:product.price)||0)};});}export default Dashboard;
